item.title: CVE-2024-37957|2024-07-20T08:12:08.922Z -- bradmax -- bradmax%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in bradmax Bradmax Player allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bradmax Player: from n/a through 1.1.27.
